name: Clockwork (itch) (AOBUT)
description:
Clockwork is a puzzle platformer where you have the ability to rearrange the levels to reach the goal. Each level can be connected and disconnected in various ways. Find the way through by joining levels together in creative ways!

This game was made for the 2021 GMTK GameJam

Director/Programmer: Marcus Kuffner

Artist/Programmer: Kidane Gabay

Music/Sound Effects: Ryan Liberty, Liam Carney

Moral Support: Joseph Palermo

Thanks for playing our game!
